text:
Outreach - https://www.outreach.io/ - Full-Stack, Backend, or DevOps - Seattle, WA - Full-time

Outreach is a small, quickly growing, funded startup with real revenues. We have a sexy product that is tackling the un-sexy space of sales automation.

Our Tech Stack Simplified

* Front - React.js (we are big believers in single page javascript applications)

* Back - Rails (nothin' but a JSON api which our front-end consumes)

* Database - CouchDB, MySQL, Elasticsearch, Redis (help us scale! we process lots of emails)

* Ops - Amazon Web Services managed via Chef

For more info: https://angel.co/outreach/jobs/46560-full-stack-engineer
